[@schuyler](@Aj30ftcGjrxufcB7xfGxlyTb+SswXacEsPjC8I8I3XY=.ed25519) 

This is great to see! It's cool to see that you were able to get a pub up and running with minimal friction.

I've noticed that *eventually* `ssb-server` starts to have some issues when left alone for long periods of time, so if you have the same experience you can restart the server hourly with:

```sh
while true; do timeout 1h ssb-server start; done
```
